Pricing.take_the_next_step: Take the next step to achieve your goals
Pricing.lynadLearn_basic_membership_offers: LynadLearn's Basic membership offers essential language learning tools, while our Premium membership unlocks a treasure trove of advanced features and personalized learning experiences.

Contact_Us.we_take_our_commitment: We take our commitment to our users seriously. If you need our help with your user account, have questions about how to use the platform or are experiencing technical difficulties, please do not hesitate to contact us.
Contact_Us.we_are_also_proud: We are also proud to work with other similar corporations and investors.

404page.sorry_the_page: Sorry, the page you were looking for does not exist.

About_us.improve_language_learning: To improve language learning process with the help of AI
About_us.we_believe_modern_learning: We believe modern learning means a user-centric approach with the help of all kinds of contents available on the internet. Our mission is to create an AI based platform to make learning more fun and customized.
About_us.a_substantial_part_of_learning: A substantial part of learning a new language includes a constant search for new content to learn and keeping track of everything that you have learned.
About_us.with_the_help_of_AI: With the help of AI this process can be fully automated, decreasing the time it takes to learn a new language substantially.
About_us.to_put_it_simply: To put it simply, we provide you with what you need to learn for the next step and help you use it in the real world.
About_us.why_is_learning_difficult: Why is learning a new language difficult?
About_us.languages_are_these_huge_chunks: Languages are these huge chunks of content and to learn a new one needs a lot of time and dedication.
About_us.learn_new_language: To learn a new language at an advanced level (at least C1) you need to learn about 10000 new words.
About_us.always_fun_start: It is always fun to start learning but to maintain this process needs strong determination that not everyone has.
About_us.if_only_there: If only there was a way to learn languages faster and easier.
About_us.we_are_team: We are a team of software developers and language experts with years of experience in designing and developing large-scale language learning platforms and products. We came to the realization that AI can help learners in many ways and are determined to change the way languages are taught and learned.
